rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a north-facing entrance that aligns with Vastu for auspicious energy. The design integrates Art Deco elements with sleek finishes and geometric patterns.
A generously sized living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the north wall for natural light and a contemporary Art Deco aesthetic.
An elegant dining area integrated with the living space, offering a seamless transition and a harmonious Art Deco design.
A modern kitchen with smart storage solutions and sleek finishes, designed for efficiency while reflecting Art Deco influences.
A luxurious master bedroom with ample space and an en-suite bathroom. The room incorporates Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and elegant detailing.
A comfortable guest bedroom designed to accommodate extended family members, featuring modern amenities and Art Deco design elements.
A shared bedroom space for the joint family that promotes togetherness while ensuring privacy through thoughtful partitioning and Art Deco style.
A functional utility room for storage, laundry, and other services, integrated seamlessly with the household operations.
A modern bathroom designed for convenience and style, incorporating Art Deco fixtures that complement the overall theme.
